basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Joann McCarthy Endowed Student Teacher Scholarship
basic_information.scholarship_notes: Total awards and amounts based on committee.
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Dr. Joann McCarthy Endowed Student Teacher
basic_information.college_name: College of Education and Professional Studies

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are student teaching in the upcoming academic year. Eligibility Requirements Student preparing for a teaching career Student doing their student teaching when scholarship is awarded Demonstrates financial need Must be enrolled in the required amount of hours in the upcoming fall and spring semesters in order to be eligible to receive this scholarship Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall or spring semester to receive award All funds from this scholarship will be distributed during student teaching Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
